about_the_game:
Embark on an enchanting journey to Paths & Danger, a masterfully crafted procedural turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends simplicity with tactical brilliance. Assemble a formidable fellowship, where the art of teamwork takes center stage. Unveil the mystery surrounding the province of Westwall and immerse yourself in the triumphant exploits of your heroes.

Main Features:


🎵 Unleash the Symphony of Heroes: Lead a group of characters, each possessing unique abilities and wielding an array of weapons.

🏆 Mastery Through Progression: Cultivate the potential of your heroes by meticulously managing their stats.

⚔️ Embrace Perilous Quests: Embark on daring escapades where danger lurks at every turn.

🌑 Unravel the Veil of Mystery: Immerse yourself in an enthralling tale, piecing together the enigma that envelopes the mystical town of Westwall.

🌟 Strategic Brilliance Unleashed: Engage in exhilarating turn-based combat, strategically maneuvering your heroes across a hex grid battlefield. Every move carries weight as you unleash devastating tactics upon your foes.

🎭 A Tapestry of Atmosphere: Surrender to the allure of a deep and immersive environment, perfectly tailored to the diverse realms awaiting your exploration.

🌌 A Dark Fantasy Unveiled: Revel in the embrace of a meticulously crafted dark fantasy world, where sublime beauty coexists with haunting darkness.

🔱 A Roguelike Odyssey: Embrace the allure of risk and reward as you traverse a realm infused with roguelike elements.

🗺️ Endless Exploration Beckons: Delight in the boundless possibilities of procedural map generation, where each step unveils new landscapes to conquer and treasures to claim. Prepare for unparalleled replayability as your journey holds infinite potential.

Ready yourself, adventurer, for the indomitable challenges that await.

Assemble a formidable fellowship, where the art of teamwork takes center stage. Unveil the mystery surrounding the province of Westwall and immerse yourself in the triumphant exploits of your heroes.

⚔️ Embrace Perilous Quests: Embark on daring escapades where danger lurks at every turn.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, updated
  • Processor: Minimum Resolution - 1336x768, Graphics Card with at least 128MB Dedicated Memory
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.08 - (Minimum) or Above
  • Processor: 2 GHz (32/64bits)
  • Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1336x768, Graphics Card with at least 128MB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: Paths & Danger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz (32/64bits)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1336x768, Graphics Card with at least 128MB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works on 32 and 64 bits systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an enchanting journey to Paths & Danger, a masterfully crafted procedural turn-based RPG that seamlessly blends simplicity with tactical brilliance. Get ready to be captivated as you assemble a formidable fellowship, where the art of teamwork takes center stage.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
